trends: There has been one other sighting in East Helena
There were no other sightings in East Helena on or around July 17th 2000
Summary: Saw bright dots in the sky moving in verticle and
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was night time and my friend Ricky and I were out on his trampolein. It wasabout midnight when I saw them, I thought it was just some planes but they weremoving unlike any plane I have ever heard of. They were moving onlynorth,south,east,and westTrue north. They didnt come close or move away theystayed the same and they only moved in straight lines and made right angel turnsMy friend was sleeping this whole time.After about a minite they came together,stayed right next to eachother for about 5-10 seconds then shot off in oppisitedirections.west and east. I wish to remain anonomis because i dont want thefeds knocking on my door.
